ComicInfo.Summary: I Feel the Earth Move Under My Feet, and the Sky Come Tumbling Down!: Avalanche tries to hold L.A. ransom by causing havoc at the airport. One of the Mole Man's minions attempts to stop him as he is also wrecking their underground domain. The Hulk gets involved as Rick and Betty were on one of the downed planes.
